Articles.Content:
The Mk1 is just a proof of concept really, just going to take it to Duna where it will serve as an orbital outpost. The Mk1 was assembeled by the brave kerbals at the Munar Spacedock 1 it was a join partnership with Zulu77 Mining industries who supplied the raw materials to the space dock.

Mods Used

  • AIES
  • Nova Punch
  • ZZZ's Hubs/Habs
  • Magic Smoke Industries Infernal Robotics
  • Kethane
  • Orbital Construction
bah i forgot the 2nd most important mod on tis project and that is ud_lethals_d0se's Large Structural/Station components
